subject: Re: [junit] test cases for inputs from file
messageBody:
> Please guide me on how to write test cases where the input to the test
> cases will come as element values from a xml file.

Instead of reading from a file, pass an InputSource to your method (for
example):

String input = "<property name=\"name1\" value=\"value1\" />";
myClass.read(new InputSource(new StringReader(input)));

Remember: you don't want to test if the JVM can read the file, but what your
class does with the file.

-Vladimir
